title: New laptop specs help
body:
OK so I posted the pic of the computer I'm getting which is a laptop. It's the best I can afford that I also need for university, will it run league smoothly enough?  Obviously it won't run with all settings turned up high but at least I need is medium settings. 

On a side note would it run Minecraft?

replies.body: It will run both League and Minecraft without a problem, you could probably run League on high settings with that because LoL really doesn't require that good of hardware to run.

This laptop is very good, league doesn't require many good stats 8GB ram is fine for most game and you have a good quad core processor.
You could run many other higher spec games than league :) should be alg on high settings even.
Best of luck summoner!
Yes it will run LoL and easily run Minecraft
